questions.question: Considering the overall form factor, what is the dominant shape of this electric toothbrush displayed on the packaging?
What is the primary color of the toothbrush handle, as visually apparent in the product image?
Based on the image, what appears to be the material composition of the toothbrush's main body?
Observing the brush head closely, what kind of bristles does it seem to have?
Does the packaging show any visible branding or manufacturer's name on the toothbrush itself?
What is the color of the secondary, additional brush head included in the package?
Judging by the image, does the handle have a textured surface or is it predominantly smooth?
Examining the base of the toothbrush, is there a visible charging indicator light or connector?
From the visual inspection of the packaging, what is the suggested power source?
Based purely on visual assessment, how many extra brush heads are visibly included?
What is the apparent design style of the toothbrush – modern, classic, or something else?
Is there a noticeable pattern on the toothbrush handle besides the brand name?
Does the packaging indicate a specific feature of the brush heads, such as 'Clean Plus'?
Based on the provided image, is the toothbrush shown to be waterproof?
What is the overall impression of the toothbrush's size – large, small, or medium?
